content: and knit 1 round work rnds 1-19 of chevron border *increase round kfb k until 2 sts rem kfb k1 2 sts increase d work 3 rnds even in st st repeat from * 9 9 13 14 times more work increase round then 5 rnds even 2 3 0 0 times 72 74 76 78 sts change to circular needle when you have enough sts to do so work even until sleeve meas 17 18 18 18 or desired length bobble all sts f inishing sew shoulder seams with smaller circular needle and rs facing pick up and knit 96 96 104 104 sts around neck est pattern round 1 *k1 p2 k1 repeat from * round 2 *k1 p2 rt p2 k1 repeat from * rnds 3 and 4 *k1 p2 k1 repeat from * repeat rnds 1-4 until neck meas 4 or desired length bobble all sts loosely sew top of sleeves into armhole openings 35¼ 41¼ 47¼ 53 weave in ends block to measurements 10 barnyard guernsey © 2017 classic elite yarns web-letter #497 for more information visit classiceliteyarns com/webletter ravelry com/yarns/brands/classic-elite-yarns facebook com/classiceliteyarns twitter com/ceyarns blog classiceliteyarns com this pattern is specifically for private use only all commercial uses involving reproduction of this pattern or duplication of this piece are prohibited page 4 of 4 72 62 52 42 7¼ 7½ 8 8½ 3 81 81 81 71 barnyard guernsey back and front 15 15½ 16 16½ barnyard guernsey sleeve
